system.description:
The dwarves are built tough. You have a sixth stat, Iron, and you have an additional +1 to assign among your other stats. Iron represents your supreme toughness - your armor, survivability, iron gut, and stubbornness.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} by outlasting them in a contest of power or endurance, roll +Iron.

When you share this Move with another, their Iron stat is +1.

When someone who does not have an Iron stat uses a Move that rolls +Iron, they roll at +0.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You lose the advantage, and must face retaliation.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: You deal damage to them and lose your advantage over them. If an ally was @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keeping Them Busy}, they aren't anymore.
